message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm offering it to you for $115. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, $105 doesn't quite cover my costs.  Would you be willing to go up to $110? That would be a fair compromise and a great deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108? That's the highest I can go.
